name: You Stop That!
description:
This game was developed during the SGDC Winter Jam of 2016 into the 2017 year. All development was done by myself, Jake Lovrin and the art assets are all completely hand-drawn by the best artist ever, Katie Bryant. We hope you enjoy the game in it's full capacity!
